name: (FREE) Sci-Fi Sex Game - NSFW
description:
Farthest Depths: Your crew has been assigned to probe the farthest depths of space. But when a bunch of horny men and women are stuck together on a space ship millions of lightyears away from Earth, things are bound to get freaky.

Hi! I'm Britt and I write Smut Dungeons, a series of erotic fantasy adventure stories featuring slutty secretaries, alpha billionaires, hunky barbarians, dashing space cadets, and naughty schoolgirls. My text games are overflowing with hot, naughty scenes to get you in the mood. Nothing turns me on like writing kinky smut and fantasizing about hot-bodied, powerful men sweeping me off my feet and having their way with me - SO HOT! ;)
Read more of my smut here!!
Please note these games are for Adults Only (18+)!
